headline: Agilent Receives European IVDR Certification for Companion Diagnostic Assay in Gastric or Gastroesophageal Junction (GEJ) Adenocarcinoma
summary: SANTA CLARA, Calif., April 17, 2025--Agilent Technologies Inc. (NYSE: A) today announced its PD-L1 IHC 22C3 pharmDx (Code SK006) assay has received European IVDR certification for the use as a Companion Diagnostic (CDx) to aid in the identification of gastric or gastroesophageal Junction (GEJ) adenocarcinoma patients who may be eligible for treatment with KEYTRUDA® (pembrolizumab)1. PD-L1 IHC 22C3 pharmDx (Code SK006) is approved for exclusive use with the Agilent Autostainer Link 48 advanced st
